= Mesh4x Software Artifacts =

Tools and products build with Mesh4x.


== Applications == 

=== [http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/kmlExchange_0_0_1.7z Kml Exhange] ===
KmlExchange is a tool to synchronize two kml files and synchronize kml files with the cloud.

Last release: 2009-02-05


== JavaRosa MIDP Demo ==
MIDP demo using JavaRosa and Mesh4J J2ME version


=== Epiinfo Mesh Client ===
Epiinfo mesh client is a tool to synchronize MSAccess files via SMS and synchronize MSAccess file with the cloud.

Last release: 2009-02-05




=== [http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/mesh4x_war_0_0_8.7z Mesh4x FeedSync server (RESTFull)] ===
Mesh4J FeedSync server (war). Supports different kind of feed repositories (S3, file).

Last release: 2009-02-05


== Tools ==

=== [http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/phone_manager_0.0.0.7z Phone Manager] ===
Phone Manager is a tool to determine if a cell phone is compatible with mesh4x sms lib.

Last release: 2009-02-05



=== SMS Exchange ===
SMS Exchange is a tool to send and receive SMS from a cell phone plugged to the PC based on file sharing.

Last release: 2009-02-05


== Developer Environments ==

=== [http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/instedd_demo.7z Mesh4J J2ME Environment with crud demo] ===
Developer J2ME environment with a crud demo. 

Last release: 2009-02-05




=== [http://downloads.instedd.org/mesh4x/mesh4x_env_0_0_1.7z Mesh4J Environment] ===
Developer J2SE environment for development Mesh4J.

Last release:  2009-02-05
